attributes.action: Remove branded food chain outlets at NHS Trusts and Authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Britain going through a Obesity crisis, & the NHS spending Billions of pounds to combat the issue.
What's shocking though is the recent "Change 4 life" campaign seems in vein as the NHS has fast food chains right in there Hospitals.
40 of 170 English NHS hospital trusts now has a branded fast food outlet. A further five are about to sign up chains. Most are cafes like Costa, Ritazza and Uppercrust. A few are takeaway joints such as Burger King!!.

How does the British public have a chance of fighting obesity in the future if our own NHS is selling us this High in fat/sugars/salt food which is causing the whole problem.

Please, get these chains out of our Hospitals & get healthy, Hospital ran "cafes" "restaurants" in it's place.

The independent did a review into what hospitals have these chains which you you can find on the internet.

So please, sign this petition and help.
